item.title: Upload your own HQ make money online niche videos to my site - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled professional to help upload high-quality educational videos for my make money online niche website https://upcasher.com .

The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring all videos meet specified criteria and are optimized for engagement and conversions.

Responsibilities:

Upload educative videos in high quality (HQ) that cater to the make money online niche.
Ensure all videos are unique and adhere to platform guidelines.
Write unique, engaging, and informative video descriptions.
Include a compelling call-to-action (CTA) in each video description, directing viewers to the website where they can learn how to make money online.
Conduct a manual review of each video before final approval to ensure quality and compliance.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video uploading and content management.
Familiarity with the make money online niche and the ability to identify relevant content.
Strong writing skills to create unique and persuasive video descriptions.
Attention to detail to ensure all content is high quality and error-free.
Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple uploads efficiently.
Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience with YouTube or other video hosting platforms.
Basic knowledge of SEO to optimize video descriptions for better reach.
Experience with video editing tools to make minor adjustments if necessary.
Application Process:

Provide examples of previous work related to video uploading and content creation.
Include a brief description of your experience with the make money online niche.
Outline your process for ensuring videos and descriptions are unique and high quality.
Budget:

Please submit your proposal with your rate per video uploaded.
I am looking forward to working with a dedicated professional who can help elevate the quality and reach of my educational video content. If you have the skills and experience required, please apply with your detailed proposal.

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:51 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Data Entry, Content Writing
Skills: Video Editing, Data Entry, Content Writing
Country: Croatia
click to apply

item.title: Marketing Assistant/Social Media Manager with Creative/Graphic Design Skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled social media manager who also has decent graphic design abilities and a little bit of interest in video editing.

The main responsibility will be managing and growing up to four CLIENTS.  

The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of various social media platforms, content creation, and community management. The ability to create engaging graphics and visual content is a must. Additionally, basic video editing skills will be required occasionally.

This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about social media and has a creative eye.

If you are organized, detail-oriented, and can work independently to meet deadlines, we would love to hear from you! We are a marketing agency that will help teach you the basics of what needs to be done, and you'll have us as support when needed. Clients will communicate with you via Slack & ONLY Slack.

You will have one manager, and a total of 4 clients tops. You are required to show up 5 days a week, and any work you do on the weekend is up to you.

The client can request you to do, research, execute additional marketing relevant tasks as well. As you are their Marketing Assistant as well as a Social Media Manager.

$500 is your monthly pay, total.


If of interest, please let me know why you would be interested in such a position. What qualifies you for this. And also about you, personally, who you are, what your goals are, where you live country wise, and your level of english. Things like that.

Thanks

Must be Fluent in English. Although client communication will be mostly text on slack, english fluency is essential for general communication

Relevant Skills:
- Social media management
- Graphic design
- Content creation
- Community management
- Basic video editing

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:50 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Instagram, Facebook, Graphic Design, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Instagram, Facebook, Graphic Design, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Image Ads Editor for Growing DTC Company - Upwork
item.description:
Position: Image Ads Editor for Growing DTC Company

We are an e-commerce company that grows rapidly and we are looking for more people to join our journey. The scope of the business is products for middle-aged women with beauty challenges in Europe, and we need to make more ads to continue this rocket growth.

That’s where you come in.

We are in search of a dynamic and innovative Image Ads Editor specifically experienced in crafting highly effective and compelling ads for Facebook, Snapchat and TikTok. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in editing video & image ads that not only capture attention but also convert views into measurable results.

Responsibilities:
Replicate high-performing image advertisements
Deliver a weekly batch of 25-50  images with multiple variants
Be the expert in the team on image advertising performance
Recurring produce high-converting image advertisements
Report on the business performance to your Manager

Requirements:
Proven experience editing converting  image ads for Facebook Ads or similar
Strong understanding of direct response marketing and marketing psychology
Obsessed with business performance and a laser focus on reducing acquisition cost
A great track-record of editing winning advertisements from in an e-commerce company
Exceptional creativity in developing ad content that engages and drives conversions.
Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects, and meet tight deadlines.

Benefits:
Potential for a long term job if results are good as we are in demand for more people.
Work in a fast-paced and creative company with people from all over the world.

Contract Details:
This is a freelance position with an hourly contract as negotiated.
Compensation will be based on your experience and track-record.

PS! Bonus if you speak Norwegian.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Short Video Ad, Video Advertising, Video Sales Letter, Performance Video, Video Editing
Skills: CapCut, Short Video Ad, Video Advertising, Video Sales Letter, Performance Video, Video Editing
Country: Norway
click to apply

item.title: Sound Design and Mixer for Promo Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled audio mixer and designer to add sound effects and mix our promo video. You'll be working with a successful boutique production company in LA, looking for global sound designer to bring a great style to the team.  The promo contains music and dialog, and we need someone who can deliver professional-level quality. This is a great opportunity for someone with experience in audio mixing and design, who can creatively enhance the overall audio experience of our promo with big ramps and sound effects that deliver world class content.
   
   Responsibilities:
   - Add sound effects to enhance visuals
   - Mix music and dialog to create a seamless audio experience
   - Ensure audio levels are balanced and optimized
   - Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and requirements
   
   Skills:
   - Proficient in audio mixing software
   - Working with editors who use Premiere or other NLE systems.  
   - Sound design expertise
   - Strong attention to detail
   
If you have a passion for audio mixing and design, and you are capable of delivering high-quality work, we would love to hear from you.

A lot of work to follow if we knock this project out of the park. Lookin forward to meeting you soon!

Hourly Range: $18.00-$29.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:42 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Adobe Audition, Audio Production, Sound Mixing
Skills: Audio Editing, Adobe Audition, Audio Production, Sound Mixing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Video Content Creator for SaaS Business - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced TikTok Video Content Creator for SaaS Business

Description:

We are a rapidly growing SaaS company looking for a talented and experienced TikTok video content creator to produce high-quality, engaging videos that resonate with our target audience. Our competitors are leveraging TikTok effectively, and we aim to create content that is equally compelling, if not better.

Responsibilities:

Create engaging, high-quality TikTok videos that highlight our SaaS products and their benefits.
Develop creative concepts and storyboards aligned with our brand's voice and marketing strategy.
Research and incorporate trending sounds, challenges, and hashtags to maximize reach and engagement.
Edit videos to ensure a professional and polished final product.
Collaborate with our marketing team to align content with ongoing campaigns and promotions.
Track and analyze performance metrics to optimize content for better engagement and reach.

Requirements:

Proven experience creating successful TikTok videos, preferably for SaaS or tech companies.
Strong understanding of TikTok’s algorithm, trends, and best practices.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas and concepts.
Excellent storytelling skills with a keen eye for detail.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with our team.

Preferred Qualifications:

Portfolio of successful TikTok campaigns or viral videos.
Experience in social media marketing and strategy.
Knowledge of SaaS industry trends and audience preferences.
Application Instructions:
Please submit your application with the following:

A brief cover letter detailing your experience and why you are a good fit for this role.
Links to your TikTok profile and/or examples of your previous work.
Your rate per video or package rates, if applicable.
Any relevant metrics or case studies showcasing the success of your past TikTok projects.
We are excited to see your creativity and look forward to working with a dynamic individual who can help us elevate our TikTok presence. Apply now to join our team and make a significant impact on our brand’s growth!

Hourly Range: $18.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:35 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, MOV, How To, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Copywriting
Skills: MP4, MOV, How To, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing, Copywriting
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Reels Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Expression of Interest.

Currently seeking a reels editor for ongoing work.

Mostly will involve a few seconds of footage and then beatmatching images to an appropriate song (the page is showcasing images so being able to make reels interesting and engaging using mostly images is key)

Theme is motivation, inspiration, gym aesthetic, car footage, athletic highlights (e.g. nba player dunking), people doing awesome stuff (e.g. somebody snowboarding).

Consistent colour grading across content is very important, we are wanting the "dark aesthetic" look.

Please include links to previous work, and your rate for generating 2-3 reels of this nature.

Thankyou


Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Channel Cartoon Recap - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to help us build a new YouTube channel focused on cartoon recaps. The candidate will be responsible for creating engaging and entertaining recap videos for popular cartoons. This role requires a strong understanding of different cartoon shows and the ability to condense the plot into short and engaging summaries. The ideal candidate should have excellent video editing skills, a creative mindset, and a passion for cartoons.
Skills:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Creative thinking
- Attention to detail
- Knowledge of popular cartoon shows

I am looking to copy this channel, recreating there videos but with differences. Looking for someone to manage everything, long term job if it goes well.

https://www.youtube.com/@JarToonyt/videos

Budget: $500

item.title: Video Producer for Garage Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video producer to create a promotional video for our garage. The video should showcase the services we offer, such as car repairs, maintenance, and detailing, as well as the state-of-the-art equipment and professional staff. It should be visually appealing, engaging, and informative, with a duration of approximately 2-3 minutes. The video will be used on our website and social media platforms to attract potential customers and increase brand awareness.
    
   Skills required:
   - Video production and editing
   - Storyboarding and scriptwriting
   - Graphic design and animation
   - Knowledge of garage services and automotive industry
    
   We are a small garage looking to grow our business, so creativity, attention to detail, and the ability to meet deadlines are essential. If you have a portfolio of similar projects and can deliver high-quality work, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:17 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Music Video
Skills: Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Music Video
Country: Qatar

item.title: Video Editor for Tik Tok and Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Video Editor who can transform raw video footage from multiple events into engaging content for Tik Tok videos and Instagram reels. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail and be able to understand the target audience for each platform. This role involves selecting the best moments, editing clips to create seamless transitions, adding captions or text overlays, and optimizing the videos for maximum impact.

   Skills required:
   - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Strong understanding of Tik Tok and Instagram culture
   - Creativity in storytelling and visual effects
   - Ability to work with various video formats and resolutions
   - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

   This is a small project with the potential for ongoing work. The duration will be under 1 month, and the expertise level required is intermediate.


Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
